entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
